favourite.article: I was reminded of this sweet hymn as I read that for Christ to make His home in my heart, and for Him to have a way in the church, that is to build it, the breaking of the outer man is both crucial and vital. Amen Lord gain what You desire.
I enjoyed singing this hymn and was reminded afresh that all things work together to conform us to the image of Christ (Rom. 8:28-29): "...Yet, as the Master shall the servant be..." Praise the Lord!
